title: 024: Arbok
author: Chris Taylor
description:
Arbok is a Pokemon with a legendary stare, rivaled by none – it could single-highhandedly conquer the world. Can it’s glare overcome Butterfrees’ reign of terror? Listen in to find out…

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword), [Aleksandar](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC56emXYp1pHXL2E9SLcYisw), [Ethan](https://twitter.com/SynSpawn), [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron)

For more episodes and the full ranking list visit [Magmar Sucks](http://www.magmarsucks.com) on the web.

For more on the Pokemon in this episode check out their [Bulbapedia page](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Arbok_(Pok%C3%A9mon))
